about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: Blocking an intersection during "rush hour" traffic is not permitted:

about.name: Blocking an intersection during "rush hour" traffic is not permitted:

hasPart.assesses: Blocking an intersection during "rush hour" traffic is not permitted: | Blocking an intersection during "rush hour" traffic is not permitted: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Even if your light is green, you should not enter an intersection unless you can get completely across before the light turns red. You can be cited if you block the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Unless you entered the intersection on a green light.

comment.text: Unless you entered the intersection on a green light.

suggestedAnswer.text: Under any circumstances, even if your light is green.

comment.text: Under any circumstances, even if your light is green.

suggestedAnswer.text: Unless you have the right-of-way or a green light.

comment.text: Unless you have the right-of-way or a green light.

acceptedAnswer.text: Under any circumstances, even if your light is green.

comment.text: Under any circumstances, even if your light is green.

answerExplanation.text: Even if your light is green, you should not enter an intersection unless you can get completely across before the light turns red. You can be cited if you block the intersection.

comment.text: Blocking an intersection during "rush hour" traffic is not permitted: | Even if your light is green, you should not enter an intersection unless you can get completely across before the light turns red. You can be cited if you block the intersection.

hasPart.name: On a freeway, you should look farther ahead than you would on a city street:

about.name: On a freeway, you should look farther ahead than you would on a city street:

hasPart.assesses: On a freeway, you should look farther ahead than you would on a city street: | On a freeway, you should look farther ahead than you would on a city street: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: On the freeway, be ready for changes in traffic conditions. Watch for signals from other drivers. Expect merging vehicles at on-ramps and interchanges and be prepared for rapid changes in road conditions and traffic flow.

suggestedAnswer.text: In order to see potential hazards early.

comment.text: In order to see potential hazards early.

suggestedAnswer.text: Because it takes a quarter of a mile to stop your vehicle completely.

comment.text: Because it takes a quarter of a mile to stop your vehicle completely.

suggestedAnswer.text: Because it helps you keep up with traffic.

comment.text: Because it helps you keep up with traffic.

acceptedAnswer.text: In order to see potential hazards early.

comment.text: In order to see potential hazards early.

answerExplanation.text: On the freeway, be ready for changes in traffic conditions. Watch for signals from other drivers. Expect merging vehicles at on-ramps and interchanges and be prepared for rapid changes in road conditions and traffic flow.

comment.text: On a freeway, you should look farther ahead than you would on a city street: | On the freeway, be ready for changes in traffic conditions. Watch for signals from other drivers. Expect merging vehicles at on-ramps and interchanges and be prepared for rapid changes in road conditions and traffic flow.

hasPart.name: At an uncontrolled intersection where you cannot see cross traffic until you are just about to enter the intersection, the speed limit is:

about.name: At an uncontrolled intersection where you cannot see cross traffic until you are just about to enter the intersection, the speed limit is:

hasPart.assesses: At an uncontrolled intersection where you cannot see cross traffic until you are just about to enter the intersection, the speed limit is: | At an uncontrolled intersection where you cannot see cross traffic until you are just about to enter the intersection, the speed limit is: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: The speed limit for a blind intersection is 15 mph. An intersection is considered “blind” if there are no stop signs on any corner and you cannot see for 100 feet in either direction during the last 100 feet before crossing.

comment.text: 15 mph.
25 mph.
20 mph.
15 mph.

answerExplanation.text: The speed limit for a blind intersection is 15 mph. An intersection is considered “blind” if there are no stop signs on any corner and you cannot see for 100 feet in either direction during the last 100 feet before crossing.

comment.text: At an uncontrolled intersection where you cannot see cross traffic until you are just about to enter the intersection, the speed limit is: | The speed limit for a blind intersection is 15 mph. An intersection is considered “blind” if there are no stop signs on any corner and you cannot see for 100 feet in either direction during the last 100 feet before crossing.

hasPart.name: If you come to an intersection controlled by a flashing yellow light, you must:

about.name: If you come to an intersection controlled by a flashing yellow light, you must:

hasPart.assesses: If you come to an intersection controlled by a flashing yellow light, you must: | If you come to an intersection controlled by a flashing yellow light, you must: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A flashing yellow traffic light means drivers must slow down, be more aware, and proceed with caution. Be alert to crossing traffic and pedestrians.

suggestedAnswer.text: Wait for the green light before proceeding.

comment.text: Wait for the green light before proceeding.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.
Stop before crossing the intersection.

acceptedAnswer.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

answerExplanation.text: A flashing yellow traffic light means drivers must slow down, be more aware, and proceed with caution. Be alert to crossing traffic and pedestrians.

comment.text: If you come to an intersection controlled by a flashing yellow light, you must: | A flashing yellow traffic light means drivers must slow down, be more aware, and proceed with caution. Be alert to crossing traffic and pedestrians.

hasPart.name: You are on the freeway and traffic is merging into your lane. You should:

about.name: You are on the freeway and traffic is merging into your lane. You should:

hasPart.assesses: You are on the freeway and traffic is merging into your lane. You should: | You are on the freeway and traffic is merging into your lane. You should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When traffic permits, you should make room to allow vehicles to merge into your lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: Make room for the merging traffic, if possible.

comment.text: Make room for the merging traffic, if possible.

suggestedAnswer.text: Assert your right-of-way by driving faster.

comment.text: Assert your right-of-way by driving faster.
Always maintain your position.

acceptedAnswer.text: Make room for the merging traffic, if possible.

comment.text: Make room for the merging traffic, if possible.

answerExplanation.text: When traffic permits, you should make room to allow vehicles to merge into your lane.

comment.text: You are on the freeway and traffic is merging into your lane. You should: | When traffic permits, you should make room to allow vehicles to merge into your lane.

hasPart.text: The speed limit in any alley is 15 mph. This is always the speed limit, whether or not it is posted.

15 mph.
25 mph.
15 mph.

answerExplanation.text: The speed limit in any alley is 15 mph. This is always the speed limit, whether or not it is posted.
